text: The PR3 mixed coxed four competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. A top-eight finish ensured qualification for the Tokyo Paralympics. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 25 August 2019 || 09:51 || Heats |- | Tuesday 27 August 2019 || 11:20 || Repechages |- | Thursday 29 August 2019 || 11:22 || Semifinals A/B |- | rowspan=3|Saturday 31 August 2019 || 10:20 || Final C |- | 11:48 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 14:25 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== The two fastest boats in each heat advanced directly to the A/B semifinals. The remaining boats were sent to the repechages. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Ellen Buttrick
